# addequip

## Description
Adds equipment to a unit's inventory or equipment slots. This function is used to equip items on characters (players or NPCs) and manage their equipment loadout.

## Syntax
```
addequip(unit, equipment)
```

## Parameters
- **unit** - The unit to equip the item on (player or NPC)
- **equipment** - The equipment object to be added

## Return Value
Returns the updated unit with the new equipment. If the operation fails, returns the original unit unchanged.

## Examples
```dil
// Equip a sword on a player
addequip(self, sword);

// Equip armor on an NPC
addequip(guard, chainmail);

// Equip multiple items
addequip(warrior, helmet);
addequip(warrior, shield);
addequip(warrior, boots);

// Use in mobile initialization
addequip(self, load_object("sword@blacksmith"));
addequip(self, load_object("leather_armor@blacksmith"));
```

## Notes
- The equipment must be a valid equipment object
- The function automatically determines the appropriate equipment slot
- Handles equipment slot validation and assignment
- Commonly used in mobile initialization and equipment shops
- Will fail if the equipment slot is already occupied
- Equipment bonuses and effects are applied automatically
